At start of turn, stun target if: Sus greater than or equal to target's total attack intent OR enemy will not attack and Sus >= 20 (either way, consume all stacks of Sus).

Increases attack damage (and block for the Imposter).  Votes trigger when there are at least 10 Votes among us: each creature takes damage equal to (10 * their number of Votes), then all Votes are removed.
For each unique buff and debuff among us, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies and gain 2 Block.  Remove all of your debuffs.
